title: Sweet-and-Sour Pepper Topping
directions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high. Add bell peppers and salt. Cook, stirring often, until darkened in spots and crisp-tender, about 8 minutes. Add anchovy and garlic. Cook, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Add vinegar and sugar. Cook, stirring often, for 1 minute. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook, stirring occasionally, until peppers are softened, about 5 minutes. Spoon over Whipped Ricotta Toasts and top with pine nuts
ingredients: 3 medium bell peppers, thinly sliced (3 cups)
